summary: Завершен Task 13 (Notification System Integration) из Phase 4 Communications. UNIFIED NOTIFICATION SYSTEM FULLY INTEGRATED! Создал comprehensive unified-notification-service.ts с multi-channel delivery (Email via Resend, SSE real-time, In-app notifications, Database persistence), intelligent user preferences filtering (quiet hours, type preferences, channel preferences), notification audit trail, retry logic. Добавил Prisma schema (NotificationLog, UserNotification, UserNotificationPreferences models). Создал REST APIs: /api/notification-preferences (GET/PUT/DELETE для user settings), /api/notifications (GET user notifications, POST test/mark-read, PUT bulk operations). Comprehensive test suite (scripts/test-unified-notification-system.ts) покрывает service functionality, database integration, API endpoints, multi-channel delivery, error handling, bulk operations, user filtering. Phase 4 Communications ЗАВЕРШЕНА - Stream Chat production ready, SSE system enhanced, unified notification system integrated!
